      • retrieveNotifications

        public static void retrieveNotifications(boolean hasReferrals,
                                         java.lang.String baseEntityId,
                                         OnRetrieveNotifications onRetrieveNotifications)
        This method is used to retrieve notifications for a particular client
        Parameters:
        hasReferrals - this action should only be performed for flavours with referrals
        baseEntityId - the clients unique identifier
        onRetrieveNotifications - callback method invoked after retrieving the notifications
